website_summaries.verdict: Users love this mirror's touch-activated, dimmable lights. It's best kept in one spot, though, because the base doesn't fold well for travel.
pros: LED-lit makeup mirror with touch-screen dimmable lights
Offers true image as well as 1x, 2x and 3x magnification
Cordless model is powered by AAA batteries
Can also plug in via USB
cons: Base does not fold well for portability
Brighter when plugged in than when run on batteries

customer_reviews.title: Very small, and  being magnified parts of the mirror are very very small and unlit.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is actually a lot smaller than it appears in the picture. I found it inconvenient because even though the lighted part is very bright, the side mirrors which are magnified have no light, and are extremely small. There is no light, so it’s even that much more difficult to see in the already tiny mirrors. I gave it to my 12-year-old who has no vision problems, and it fits perfectly on her desk for use. I would have sent it back otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Trish C

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I liked the stickers to explain how to use it and the friendly note in the box. It was so bright that it lit our camping cabin better than our lantern! I liked having the option to use with a plug or with batteries. I just wish the stand folded up. I could not undo the clips once it was on. I'm pretty sure it'll get broken eventually in my packing. But the price is so good, and the product works great, I won't mind buying another if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I spent $30 on a smaller version of that one at Bed Bath & Beyond and hated it, it was WAY too small
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this mirror. I had an older large Conair circular flip magnified makeup mirror that died a couple months ago (RIP). I spent $30 on a smaller version of that one at Bed Bath & Beyond and hated it, it was WAY too small. I figured, what the heck, this one looks like the right size at least, and when I got it, I was SO excited because it is exactly what I need. The battery AND plug charging options are great for traveling or needing it in a place with no plug if necessary. I highly recommend this, and will be buying this kind from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: MaddieLion

customer_reviews.title: Great little make up mirror for fifteen dollars.
customer_reviews.text: What a great mirror! For the price, which I thought was so inexpensive, it’s very nice! Lights up nice and bright, touch dimmer works great, has multiple magnifications. Only the middle main mirror has the light surrounding it just so you know. I bought it for a kid’s birthday (she’s really into make-up) and we liked it so much my daughter and I both ordered one also. Happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle T

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I like how bright the light is. I also like the dimmer for the light. I wish I could make it higher; I am blind without my glasses so I have to hunch over to see in the mirror. The thing I am not wild about is when I have it plugged in if I move the mirror the cord will pull it down. It doesn’t stay up. I have to keep pulling it up to see.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Park

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for makeup ++
customer_reviews.text: You will love how you look in this mirror! The lights create the perfect circumstances to put on makeup, or other grooming chores, with no weird shadows, just bright, but kind illumination. Handy magnifiers on the side. This mirror is fine for traveling, as it's lightweight, and about the size of a tablet, so would just slip in a suitcase or backpack. If you can't get the base off, it will still tuck into just about any bag. And because it folds closed, the mirrors are protected. If you have questions or concerns, contact the seller, as they are very responsive and accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora

customer_reviews.title: Light broken
customer_reviews.text: This product came broken. It was packed in an open box inside of a bubble envelope. The cord was loose in the envelope. The light would not turn on despite the little red power indicator light being on. I reached out to the manufacturer using the contact info they provided in box with my order # and they didn't respond. I would have had to pay $8.00 to return it through Amazon's return process so I attempted to fix it but broke the mirror in the process ( which was totally my fault). I was able to get the light to flash on and off by creating a contact with the circuit but it was not usable in any way.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Blinding light, no memory setting, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Came in a box it was obviously too big for. The light is so bright thag it almost blinded me! It doesn't remember the setting of the light and by the time I set it i have to deal with this horrible white fluorescent beaming in my face! The base snaps on with an effort but good luck taking it off when travel. May hurt yourself. Same with batteries, quite a chore to put them in and change. Overall, cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Aine Letcher

customer_reviews.title: and overall im still happy with the size and its ability to fold
customer_reviews.text: i was so excited about this product, and overall im still happy with the size and its ability to fold, but the piece where my mirror plugged in to make the light fell out of its place just a week into owning it (and rattles around) and the light stopped working because i think that there is a bit of a disconnect in the simple wiring beneath the mirror. however, it was inexpensive enough and nice enough i am considering making the purchase again and trying to be more gentle with it, because when it worked, the lighting was phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Mint

customer_reviews.title: Beads stink but the rest is good
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for makeup brushes, mascara, blush, and bronzer. I like that the box is enclosed, so it keeps my stuff dust free and germ free (because it's in a bathroom). However, like many other reviewers, I noticed a foul odor emanating from the pink beads. It's a cross between a chemical smell and the smell of moth balls. Nevertheless, it is unpleasant, and now all my brushes smell disgusting. I would say the product is good but buy your own beads.
customer_reviews.author: Krishnagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for your vanity table !!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, so first off I love when small businesses add the small touch of adding a thank you, and also the many ways to get in touch if you have any issues ! I was just looking for a mirror to add that extra light to my vanity table. I really like the usb option , for those like myself who do not like batteries haha It arrived perfect the guy that delivered it placed it softly on the ground and I think that makes a huge difference on who is handling your package as with many things if it's dropped or thrown around it could affect the product . Great mirror 👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mirror. I was super worried that the light wouldn't be bright enough or natural enough but it's amazing, super bright. I also love that the light can be dimmed. It fold up so it saves space. I really love this mirror. I was going to buy a way more expensive round one from another company that was 2 sided (I have previously had one but gave it to my mother because she liked it.) but decided to give this a shot first. So glad I did that, because I like this so much more than the mirror I gave my mother. Well worth the price in my book.
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: Explore other options ** Update**
customer_reviews.text: Yeah...I don’t know about this mirror. Not holding a charge and won’t remain fully bright unless it’s plugged in to a power source. So not really the clean, cord-free thing I was going for and not great for travel. **5-MONTH UPDATE** Lights stopped working completely. Tried fresh batteries and new cord, but no luck. Changed rating to 1-star.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Vesta

customer_reviews.title: Bright Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I did my makeup in my normal mirror, then went to this one, and WOW! I could see how un-blended my makeup really was! This mirror really helps get your face looking great. Magnifying mirrors zoom in on small areas. The light is bright but not blinding. Works well plugged in, haven't tried it with batteries yet. Took it on a girls' trip, and it packs up easily without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: ENSeeber

customer_reviews.title: BEST AND MOST AFFORDABLE THING YOU COULD OWN
customer_reviews.text: I sincerely don't normally get excited about products. I'm always just satisfied that this works. UNTIL this product was completely ABOVE MY EXPECTATIONS. I was so worried it would be smaller than I needed, but it is the PERFECT size for me! It is about as tall as a desk lamp! Its so easy to use with great results. I was immediately blown away with the amount of light it gives! It's like magic. idk why this lamp is getting me all excited, but it has and this is where we are lmao
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lighting color is not flattering for applying make-up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace an old-school mirror with light bulbs. This mirror has a bright white, fluorscent looking light that is just not flattering to use when applying make-up. The side mirrors are not large enough to be useful. Overall, very disappointed in this product. I will probably end up buying a different mirror from a different manufacturer and replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mirror. It’s easy adjustable and was exactly what I expected. My only issue with it is after a month of having it the lights on the mirror started dimming whenever it’s on, even if it’s fully charged. My solution to this problem is leaving it plugged in when I am using it and it keeps the lights as bright as it was when the mirror was new. This isn’t an issue for me, but if you are traveling with it, it would not be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a month!
customer_reviews.text: Super sad! This mirror worked great for 3 weeks and now it turns off for no reason. Sometimes it doesnt even turn on at all. It will stay on for 2 seconds and then die out and the little red light fades out too (and i tried with batteries instead and it still flopped)! Im super sad this mirror turned out to be cheap :/ I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Reina saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and flimsy product but decent light
customer_reviews.text: You truly get what you pay for and in this case, the charging dock for the mirror broke within a day of having it. It’s very lightweight and I wouldn’t recommend it for traveling. You definitely should keep it in one spot to prevent it from breaking because it seems so fragile. The brightness level on the light is pretty good but I feel like the side mirrors are the same magnitude and don’t increase in magnification. There are only two magnification sizes but it has multiple mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Party Shopper

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked long and hard for a good makeup mirror that offered great lighting and magnification. This one does it all. It's a great size, light, bright and just pleasant to see sitting there when I want to actually SEE what I'm gonna look like before heading out into the world. I mean, who wants to believe their makeup looks like a MAC masterpiece, only to come face-to-face with the reality that is the lighting outdoors and realize you look more like something that was HIT by a Mack (truck, that is). Awesome mirror! So much so, I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Freire

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a USB cable long enough to reach an outlet so I use one of those battery packs you use to recharge your phone on the go. It works great. My only complaint, which is not really a complaint but more of a suggestion for future models, is to have the ability to increase the height. I don't have a table high enough to look straight into the mirror without tilting it, which could cause some issues when applying makeup so I have to place some books under it to raise it. A height adjustment would be a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, really bright lights, super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror, and the different magnifications came in so handy. The lights are really bright, which was the biggest thing for me so I’m happy. Added note, I have a 2 year old and he’s knocked this mirror over SO many times, and it’s perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Segura

customer_reviews.title: Blinking at lower levels
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but if I try to lower the brightness I get this crazy blinking that hurts my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ampierce7

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was suppose to come with usb charger. When I received mirror charger was not included. Nice mirror but would have been 5 star if usb charger was included like box indicated. I hope amazon makes this purchase right.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: you have to either get batteries or have it plugged in my laptop. I would have liked to be able to plug it in my wall. It would just be nice for an option. The brightness could be better. This was a gift to my daughter and she is content for now but I have my own and mine is much brighter and I don’t need batteries. So I am very meh, about it. Wanted to buy another one for my other daughter, but I may look around just to see what other options amazon has.
customer_reviews.author: platforms

customer_reviews.title: Very clean image just wish it was brighter
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the the product is lightweight and charges off of a standard USB. The image is very clear and the magnifying mirrors are awesome. The only thing that I feel is lacking with the mirror is that it’s not very bright and unfortunately the reason I ordered it is because my room is kind of dark and I was trying to save space and not buy a floor lamp for the part of the room why’ll put my makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: Jodibee G.

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: works great, but just for about 10min. the light begins to fade and won’t brighten all the way again until it’s been turned off for a while, regardless of whether i’m using it with batteries or conected to a light source. honestly i wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: After looking through many mirrors I settled on this one. I was looking for a simple, inexpensive mirror to keep at my jewelry workstation, just to see how different pieces wear through different movements. I got a product far better than expected! It's compact, the light is bright, and the stand is sturdy. I have absolutely no complaints. I am purchasing a second! Edit: Got my second mirror, and it was the same great quality!
customer_reviews.author: K.Riley

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT COME WITH USB CORD
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT COME WITH USB CORD.. very unsatisfied regarding this. Otherwise, great product. UPDATE: I used this product 2x and on the second use- it BROKE! The small piece where you connect a USB charger popped right into the inside of the makeup mirror. I can hear it move. I now cannot use the light. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I had a really nice one and I forgot the brand I bought this one thinking it was very similar it is horrible. The lighting does nothing but barely turns on the picture I took is with the light on.
customer_reviews.author: danielle zupka

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year and lights won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Have not had this mirror for a year and it’s so dim now even when it is plugged in. I can’t even use it it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as gift when it was taken out of the box, the mirror was cracked. I would've returned it but the return window had closed before i gave the gift. This was a replacement because the first one i gave was also cracked and by the time this friend came back to town and opened it, we realized this one was cracked as well. Never buying.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Paz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lighting, versatile
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror! Its excellent lighting for applying makeup (even better then natural light). I love the adjustable dimming setting, I use it to get ready just sitting in my bed which is 100x easier then standing in my bathroom which has terrible lighting anyways. This is honestly a great product and a super fair price. I recommend i:)
customer_reviews.author: YbbaNerosa

customer_reviews.title: Mirror arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror arrived broken and shattered at the corner. I like the mirror itself but packaging could be a lot better. The pieces just fell on my floor right when I opened the mirror and cut my foot.. they need to fix their packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for mornings!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Im that lazy bitch that doesn't want to do her makeup in the bathroom so I wanted this mirror to do it while I watch stuff on my computer but without turning the lights on. This gets bright. It is a blue led of course, it may mess with coloration but I don't mind. I leave it plugged into my computer so I don't have to worry about batteries. I haven't traveled with it not know the durability factor, so far it's great
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Dead and Gone
customer_reviews.text: Light is not coming on after 5 months. The mirrors are angled weird for use. Mostly looking into the middle and right panels. Sucks that even the battery doesn’t give any life to to mirror. Probably get something that you don’t have to buy twice.
customer_reviews.author: KCR

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for everybody. As a guy i use this when Im cleaning my face or when ever I need some good lighting to clean out my braces. You can install batteries but I do keep it connect to my computer as I dont have to worry about battery life . If you use batteries, the lighting wont be as bright as when you connect via the cable it came with. I like the desing because it has multiple mirrors with different with different close up ranges
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it the light is not bright enough it was a waste of money. I can not use it.
customer_reviews.author: joy troxell

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was better than the first mirror almost identical that I bought. Touch on/off switch responds well, which was a problem with another mirror I got. Nice and bright. Only problem I had was the plug in area to use a usb (which btw makes it even brighter) fell apart inside the mirror after one use. So I can only use batteries now. Other than that it’s a good cheap mirror.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.M.A

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love my mirror, the only thing I would say is that you can tell it’s cheaply made I guess? Plastic, Very light, and you can’t just close the mirror with one hand, you have to hold it down to close it or else it slides everywhere, I’m sure there’s a way to fix that but. That’s about it other than that the brightness is perfect, the dim option is good too. Good mirror for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Light very subtly flickers but this is still a really good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, the dimmer and that it has the option to use batteries or be plugged in. Also love that it can fold and tuck away to the back of my desk. The light flickers ever so subtly when the brightness is turned up all the way, that’s my only complaint, but nothing worth returning it for. Anyone review or question said its brighter when plugged in compared to batteries- I haven’t tried batteries yet but I would have thought plugging it in would give my the flickering. Oh it also has a convenient little dish at the base to hold whatever for you. Perfect for keeping track of hair pins or other smaller items. Overall, I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read mixed reviews about the brightness of this mirror. Well, I've had it a few weeks now and use it daily in the dark (I work at 5am and my boyfriend is still asleep, so I keep the room lights off) and it is BRIGHT!!! Wish the middle mirror were larger, but I like it. Seems decently made for the price, and the USB port seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AngelB

customer_reviews.title: Was good at first..
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was amazing for the first couple days. I purchased it for a trip where a group of friends and I rented an RV. Loved how the mirror had magnifying panels and how you could dim the lights around the edge. Well after two days the light stopped working. I figured the batteries had died but when I arrived back at home and tried putting new batteries in, it did not help. The light stopped working after using it twice. So now it is only functional as a mirror, and I bought it because I needed the light as well so it's not of good use for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: With only batteries in it, it works well, but not for long. I got maybe 2-3 hours of constant use before the batteries died, and they were brand new batteries when I put them in. If I have batteries in and plug the USB in, only the brightest setting works. If I dim the light at all, the light strobes and makes the mirror unusable. I'm pretty sure I'm outside of my return window now, so it will probably just go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Liz D

customer_reviews.title: Bright and power connection
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. Bright light. Battery power drains FAST but I love the ability to hook it up to a usb power source—main reason I bought this. I hook it up to a travel power bank! I would maybe like a section of higher magnification but it’s probably best I don’t poke at my face any more than I do! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not offer full lighting strength unless the charger is plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: It took about 2 weeks or this mirror to go from 5 to 2 stars in my estimation. I loved all the features, but in my dim little vanity corner I need the full burst of light. As it is now, I cannot have more than 70% unless it s charging . I would like to receive a replacement for the defect. I hope I will not need to start all over with a search for something else.
customer_reviews.author: V.E.Rose

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact.  Cute for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I was expecting, but that was my own fault for not reading the dimensions in advance. This unit is very small. Lights up well and works fine, so I'm keeping it. The sturdiness is a little questionable, I'm not sure the hinges on the outer mirrors will last very long... time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: MsMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Great But..
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this new mirror! I love that it has the choice between batteries and the cord adapter. The brightness is also very good. Very easy to use and is great to travel with. If there is one bad thing I have to say is that the cord is very short probably around 3 feet long. Other than that it works and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Koeniginchen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a brightly lit vanity. This lighted mirror has been perfect. It’s small enough to not compete with other dresser top items; yet, large enough to use easily for makeup and tweezing. The light brightness adjusts easily. When fully lit, the mirror is surprisingly bright.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: So I love this mirror. It replaced my lamp and mirror combo and saves a TON of space on my vanity. Exactly as pictured. Only drawbacks are the power cord is a little shorter than I'd like and the power input is on the bottom so it's a little tight on the cord when it's nearly to fully upright.
customer_reviews.author: PryncsMnstrTrck

customer_reviews.title: It’s a mirror but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror came packaged well for a fragile item. The light is bright but it does illuminate enough to see. You could use this without the light feature. The only con is the weight distribution. It only moves up and down at a 45 degree angle. Does not adjust as far as height goes. I typically place it on top of my jewelry box . Great for the price though. #mixed feelings. Probably won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus is REAL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing light on this mirror 😒🤔
customer_reviews.text: I thought this mirror would be great since my room is a little dark but I was very dissatisfied with the life of the light. The light was fine at first but after talking few uses the light needed to be plugged in. The problem is that the light doesn't work anymore. I tried charging it several times even moving it to different outlets. No luck with charging so now I have a no light mirror which is not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: myrna myles

customer_reviews.title: Short power cord.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely short and dissapointing power cord!!!!! Inqas hoping to use this while sitting at the table to sit...but cord too short and it's the old android version.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Flick

customer_reviews.title: Your choice to buy this item
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that after using it for a while you have to charge the mirror to brighten the lights so if you lost the charger, you’re out of luck unless you can find a similar charger that works just as perfect Also the item is pretty small for the price the seller is selling .i like the mirror has different microscope view in squares.
customer_reviews.author: Lilianne miller

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part of getting ready!
customer_reviews.text: I use the mirror every day when getting ready before classes. When living in a small dorm room with a roommate, it’s difficult to get ready when they’re still sleeping, since you don’t want to turn the lights on. This mirror saves me every time! I love how high quality it is and how bright the lights truly are. It really helps me to see where I should keep blending, what needs more work, etc. I love using the magnified part of the mirror for blending my eyeshadow, too. Customer service is even better! When my mirror randomly stopped working after a while, they sent me a free replacement! Seriously love this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Im impressed
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I easnt expecting much grom this mirror because of the price, but wow! I bought this mirror for my daughter's for Easter. They both love it! Especially the fact that you can plug it in with the USB cord thats included or use batteries. My one daughter also uses it as a nightlight when its on low. Ijust had to order one for myself when i saw theirs. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TYoung3

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is a bit smaller than I expected, but that's on me because the dimensions were clearly stated on the website. This mirror will work well for my needs as I wanted something I could use to help me apply makeup without using my glasses. It is a perfect size to take with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Francophile in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: It’s small but cool
customer_reviews.text: edit: I really do love this mirror. I wish it were just a little bit bigger but it's well-built and seriously beautiful and practical. t’s really small and I thought it’d be bigger so that I didn’t have to be so close to the mirror. The touch screen is great and the light is really bright.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Autry

customer_reviews.title: Lighted Makeup MIrror
customer_reviews.text: I like the product a lot. However, I would have preferred the magnification section to be on the right side of the mirror instead of the left. I see much better on my right than I do on my left so I have a little bit of difficulty with this feature. Other than that, I like the mirror a lot. It would have been a good idea to provide some kind of traveling case. Even though I have not traveled anywhere at this time, It is a good size for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Nice but hard to lock into position
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it is hard to keep the mirror locked in one position. I can put where I need then but then it slowly tilts down leaving the mirror looking at my neck and not my face. It takes some patience to get it to cooperate.
customer_reviews.author: K.Adams

customer_reviews.title: The lights stopped working after a while.
customer_reviews.text: I had this mirror for a little more than half a year now. The light for the mirror stopped working about 3 months after i purchases the mirror. It would slowly go dimmer when I put the light on. Otherwise the mirror itself is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: X. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror for my makeup vanity to replace an old one that doesn't light up. I really like the light/dimming feature and the streamlined look of the mirror. I do wish that there was an area of even more magnification though. I am overall very happy with my selection of this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: SCShopper

customer_reviews.title: Have to keep mine plugged in
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first because of the different mirrors and the light was bright. However after only 3 uses with brand new batteries it didn’t stay bright. The only way now I can keep it bright is by keeping it plugged in when used. That’s good if you are planning on using it in one spot. I have to put mine away everyday since I don’t have a vanity so it’s one more step to take. Other than that I do like it! Just wish I didn’t have to keep it plugged in to get the full brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect makeup mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I got this makeup mirror for my granddaughter for Christmas. She is so please with it and it is exactly what she wanted. The mirror is easy to set up and use and travel with. It is well made and a great addition to her beauty tools. I am planning on getting one for my daughter and myself soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jelissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mirror. The adjustable lighting is perfect. I spend a lot of nights either at a family members home if they are ill or I enjoy to run away to the mountains. I have a skin condition that really makes me self conscious and having my make-up applied right is very important. This mirror allows me to take it ANYWHERE as I don't need a power source and have the proper lighting to get ready for the day. SO HAPPY I FOUND IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The last time I owned a Make Up mirror was when I was in high school, some 40 years ago. When this mirror was delivered it is much smaller than the make up mirrors of old. But this size is perfect!! It is perfect for travel, you can dim the light if wanted, there are 3 different sized mirrors - regular, close up and really close up. I would highly recommend this make up mirror. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: kathi r. lau

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: When I first put this on, I thought I would never be able to sleep. I got used to it very quickly, a night or two. I have been using it for a month now and am sleeping very well. It keeps my bottom jaw from unhinging and choking my air off, which was waking me up many times. I did make a small adjustment by extending the Velcro for a tighter fit because I am a small woman.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kelly

customer_reviews.title: very nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: this mirror has been good. it is extremely bright. althought i wish it came with its own ac adapter. only usb cable. it has slots for battery but it drains them within 4hrs with 30mins at a time.. no point in making that sort of waste in batteries. get an ac for the usb and its good. i will keep an eye on it if it overheats like othe products. but i believe its more of user abuse and extensive use.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It’s perfect for doing makeup, the lighting is great, I can easily see any imperfections on my makeup application. I did my makeup in a magnified mirror at hotel, that’s what prompted me to buy one for myself. Having good lighting and a magnifying mirror is a makeup must! I keep mine plugged in, I love that it also has a battery option.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Big enough mirror; takes little space on counter
customer_reviews.text: Have used this mirror every day since getting it. Being a short person, when sitting I can see only my forehead and hair in the wall mirror. This mirror is adjustable and suits me just fine. Great mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HisChild

customer_reviews.title: The best mirror for a dorm room
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter who will be living in a very small dorm. She LOVES this mirror. It's bright and the perfect size for doing her makeup. The little tray is very helpful and we love that we have the option to plug it in, or use batteries. Very good quality and packaged really well. Another bonus is it folds up, allowing her to store it easily. This was the best mirror we could've bought for her situation.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Fishel

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lighted mirror to take with me to college and I found this one for a decent price. The lights are bright and easy to dim. Its a perfect size in my opinion and doesn't take up too much space and would be perfect for travelling. The only downside to the mirror is that it isn't chargeable. It comes with a cord that you plug in to the mirror and it'll power the mirror, but only if its connected. If youre looking for a mirror that you can charge and use later this isn't it. That being said the mirror works perfectly fine with just batteries installed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Jacobo

customer_reviews.title: Great price, light rocks, awesome mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! This makeup mirror was exactly what I wanted- it was a GREAT price, the light is so helpful (the dimming setting is the coolest thing EVER) and the side mirrors do their job. The side mirrors can be folded in and that's great for packing and on-the-go! This mirror is stylish and perfect on my vanity. I would 100% recommend this to others (and already have) !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: The product has exceptional quality in the mirrors that offers different magnifications. The mirror angles can be adjusted. It is battery operated or can also be powered through USB. The touch screen on the mirror can adjust the brightness of the lights. However, the lights in my particular product flicker when it's not on either the brightness or most dim selection. That doesn't entirely affect me because I only use it on its brightest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Really a perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! I love the three different parts and the fact you can see up close and far away at the same time. It is big enough to really see good and small enough that it fits great on the bureau.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Batteries die kinda fast and lights dim as batteries die but great when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I really like this mirror. This is perfect for traveling or if you are staying in an RV or anywhere else for that matter. The light is fabulous and the extra magnification is a plus. Love the dimming switch even though I am not using it. You will NOT be disappointed. Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I know... I know. The dimension are given in the description. Some how I thought this would be a bit larger. This mirror wasn't my first choice but after reading the reviews? Felt like the best choice. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Celestial Season

customer_reviews.title: Mmm it’s okay but not that bright.
customer_reviews.text: Very neat. Not as bright as I thought it would be. I used batteries at first and then I used the USB cable and it was brighter. Nice gift for teens but not so much a good use for Youtubers or professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Buttaflyj

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed. This is PERFECT. The light is super bright and has a dimming option with the touch of a finger, similar to an iphone home button! It is the perfect size and could even be great for traveling. It is super sturdy as well considering you just snap it onto the base! Takes batteries or has a plug into the the wall option! Loveeee this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usb plug in a huge plus
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has become one of my most valuable makeup tools. Vanities prevent me from getting as close to the mirror as needed for eyeshadow application, so this is the perfect solution. A big plus is the usb plug. I saw other mirrors that require batteries and that just seemed like a headache waiting to happen in having to replace batteries.
customer_reviews.author: AML_81

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: Wanted and needed a new makeup mirror; preferably an up-to-date one. I saw this one and I don't regret my purchase at all. My daughter and I love it! Makes so much more room on the vanity too!
customer_reviews.author: Scattered Energy

customer_reviews.title: Very functional for its size
customer_reviews.text: I love the multi panel mirror with the different magnifications and the dimmer function. The item was smaller than I had anticipated but it is still very useful. I would have liked the max setting a little brighter, but it will work as is. Great value, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Katnic Annis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to do this review, but the mirror is fantastic!! One of my favorite amazon purchases ever (and that says a lot, I shop almost everyday lol). Great quality, love the light and seems pretty sturdy esp for the low price!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little mirror. Originally I wanted a round mirror but decided to give this a try. I'm glad I did. I recently converted a room in my house into my office/dressing room. This is an awesome addition to my new room. It is beautiful, functional and everything I needed and more. The friendly customer service and excellent directions are the personal touch that leaves an impact. I will definitely be recommending this mirror and company to others. I also have 4 daughters and now they all want one too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A little dim, but very lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I like the various mirriors, but finish the lights were just a little bit brighter. Its fine if I am up close usibg the mirror, but if I try to sit back and do my makeup, the light doesn't reach my face. I have tried new batteries, but it doesn't change anything. However, I love how easy it is to travel with!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymey Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mirror as a surprise for my girlfriend and she loved it more than expected. The light is perfect the two side mirrors are wonderful for applying makeup. Overall it is a perfectly designed mirror. Even has a usb power option which makes life so much easier and allows for this to be put up permenantly without changing out batteries. The light is a wonderful makeup light and not a dull one that claims to be for makeup. I would totally buy again if anything happens to this one. Wonderful little mirror for the ladies
customer_reviews.author: Meet Jansari

customer_reviews.title: Broken already
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror in Sept. 2018. The jack for the USB cord has broken. I only disconnected the cord about three time, it should not be broken already.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient port but otherwise LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My first lighted mirror, I’m impressed, i love it! I have horrible lighting in my room so without this mirror I was limited to minimal makeup. The only thing that i didn’t like was that the port for the cord is angled towards the front, b/c that made it hard for me to plug it into the outlet but I made it work. I wish the port was next to the battery compartment, which would make it easier to use for my set up. I also wish there was a longer cable, so I had more flexibility. Otherwise love it & especially love that you can dim it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is incredibly bright, and I am able to see lines and flaws on my skin, that I wasnt able to see with my last light up mirror, which is scary, but so glad I can now see the imperfections- I can now work to cover them up! So happy with my mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great company and product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and how easy it is to put away into a drawer and pull out when needed. I have minimal counter space in my bathroom and normal lighted magnifying mirrors can be sooo expensive! This one makes me feel like a glamour queen and helps me get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bright light!
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied with this purchase. The light is incredibly bright and I love the dimming feature. The two magnifying mirrors on the left are really helpful. I like how adjustable the mirror is. It's really lightweight and folds flat so traveling with it would be no problem. Great product at a great price point!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Foy

customer_reviews.title: Yeeeesss
customer_reviews.text: I live this mirror!! My only issue is I wish I could have gotten it in black. It is super bright and durable. Magnifying mirrors are very handy for getting up clear for eyebrows and eyeliner. I have cataracts so it makes it easier to do my makeup
customer_reviews.author: AlexisSimone

customer_reviews.title: Bright and effecient
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I have been looking for a good vanity mirror that has LED lights for travel and this one cannot be beat. I haven’t put batteries in it so I’m not sure how bright it is with batteries but it is pretty bright while it’s plugged in. All in all great product and I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to take to her dorm room. She loves it! The brightness and magnification are perfect. I may end up buying a second one to keep at home for myself. It’s an awesome mirror.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The price was great for the product received.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for your product, the mirror was beautiful and just what I wanted and needed, I can see how to do my brows, and put on my make up perfectly. Once again thank you so much .......Karolyn Wilson
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and more
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for when I travel for dance competitions and also used it when getting ready for a wedding. When everyone is fighting for the mirror, I'm perfectly happy getting ready in my corner with my mirror, stress-free. I even started using it in the mornings at my breakfast table so I don't have to lean over the sink in the bathroom. So much better.
customer_reviews.author: HMC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail today but it’s already so much better than my old one for Walmart. It’s nice and sturdy, really pretty. I’m keeping it plugged in because of other reviews I saw that said it’s brighter plugged in. It really illuminates you’re face, and you even have the outline in your eyes. Picture does not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice little, lackluster lights
customer_reviews.text: The mirrors are nice quality. The stand itself is nice and sturdy. Have traveled with it before. I never take the base off though, and have heard it’s easily broken. The reason for only 3 stars is primarily because the light really doesn’t do much and dies very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CasB

customer_reviews.title: Dancers Heaven
customer_reviews.text: This make up mirror works like a charm when the dance team is preparing for their performance. My daughter said they all fight over her mirror now. The lights adjust easily and are plenty bright! I like that it folds compactly for her to fit into her dance bag.
customer_reviews.author: svwhy

product_meta.title: Absolutely Luvly Trifold Vanity Mirror with Lights | LED Makeup Mirror with Lights and Touch Screen Dimming - 1x 2x 3x Magnification - Portable Lighted Makeup Mirror | Great Vanity Mirror with Lights
product_meta.description:
Touch Screen LED Lighting
Easy to use on/off touch button doubles as a touch screen dimmer switch when you press and hold your finger on the small circle to achieve the perfect amount of light to touch up your makeup.

Perfect Complexion With Clarity
The High Definition Vanity Mirror will show you every detail you want to see and every detail you want to hide from being seen! 

Find The Perfect Viewing Angle For You
Featuring 180° of swivel vertical rotation connecting the mirror to the base! 

Magnified Confidence
The Absolutely Luvly Dimmable LED Lighted Makeup Mirror features normal 1x magnification mirrors on the main mirror and right door plus the left door is split between 2x and 3x magnification so that you can see every detail with ease! 

Portable Beauty Products
No matter if you are a growing princess or a modern woman, there's no denying the convenience of portability when it comes to making sure your makeup is just right at the touch of a button. Thanks to its battery powered cordless portability, the Absolutely Luvly Makeup Mirror is ready to go wherever beauty is needed! Requires 4 x AAA Batteries (Not Included) or power using the included 1m USB cable!

No Blemishes
If you're not 100% satisfied with your Absolutely Luvly Lighted Makeup Mirror, contact us for a full refund or replacement within 30 days of purchase. Every Absolutely Makeup Mirror is covered by our popular 12-month warranty too! 

Product Dimensions:

Height: 9.5"

Width: 13.6"

CLICK THE ADD TO BASKET BUTTON AT THE TOP OF THIS PAGE AND REVEAL YOUR TRUE BEAUTY TODAY
feature_bullets: THE COSMETIC TOUCH - Dimmable touch screen LED lighted makeup mirror with lights that dim as you press and hold your finger on the touch sensitive button to help you get exactly the right amount of 'natural daylight replicating' light to touch-up your make up or apply fake lashes.

MIRROR, MIRROR ON THE WALL - Find your perfect viewing angle using the Absolutely Luvly Lighted Makeup Mirror's 180° swivel rotation, making it easier to check your make up or hair from any view! See the finer details using the 2X/3X Magnification Left Side Mirror.

HIGH DEFINITION CLARITY - Our makeup mirror with lights and magnification help you see every detail with the High Definition Mirror surrounded by a bright ring of LED lights designed to mimic natural daylight which you can also easily dim to suit your preference.

PORTABILITY MADE EASY - Cordless, lightweight and AAA battery powered (not included) makes this LED vanity mirror with lights perfect to carry with you to your lockers, dorms, friend's houses, theatre class, or any table you can turn into your makeup desk! Or plug in the included 1m USB cable and never run out of battery again!

NO BLEMISHES - If you're not 100% satisfied with your Absolutely Luvly Make Up Mirror With Lights, simply contact us for a full refund or replacement within 30 days of purchase. Every Absolutely Luvly Lighted Makeup Mirror is also covered by our popular 12-month warranty.
